column4: hello folks - I'm just some large files across via Nautilus on a recent Seagate drive. I'm getting 13 MB/sec which I think is far too slow!! Any ideas?
if its from the same hardrive to the same hardrive, thats normal then.
no. It's from a 500GB 7200.10 to a 1.5TB, both Seagate. These are also large files so In my experience that usually goes quick.
